title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You sport a talent for making fewer words work harder for you. You might want to get to the point as quickly as possible so you can move onto other topics. Perhaps time feels compressed and sparse now, prompting you to make the most out of every moment. Some people may appreciate your brevity. But others who are wrapped up in their feelings expect more from you today. Unfortunately, your austere manner likely strikes them as uncaring and unsupportive. Set aside more time for those who matter. Your emotional availability is the sweetest gift. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
